#summary Compiler Options
#labels Featured

*generate_field_map* (java_bean)
 * generates a mapping between the field number and field name.
 * If on, you can serialize json encoded messages writing either its field name or its field number.
   {{{ 
      boolean numeric = true;
      JsonIOUtil.writeTo(out, message, numeric);
   }}}

*numeric* (gwt_overlay)
 * the encoded property name of a message is referenced by its field number.
 * {"firstName":"John","lastName":"Doe"} is json-serialized as {"1":"John","2":"Doe"}

*separate_schema* (java_bean)
 * lite-runtime, better readability on the source
 * the schema of the message/pojo is statically declared separately

*generate_helper_methods* (java_bean, gwt_overlay)
 * additional helper methods for repeated fields

* ${message.name}.implements_declaration = implements com.example.Foo* (java_bean, gwt_overlay)
 * the matching message will implement the given interface.
 * Note that gwt overlays can implement interfaces as of gwt-2.0

* ${message.name}.extends_declaration = extends com.example.Bar* (java_bean)
 * the matching message will extend the given class.
